# SetEnable

**Instance Method**

Enables or disables the delivery of events to your code.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t SetEnable(bool enable);
```

## Parameters

- **enable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to enable or disable the dispatch source. Specify `true` to enable it or `false` to disable it.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. See [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Enabling and Disabling the Source

- **SetEnableWithCompletion**: Enables or disables the dispatch source.
